name: Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Hair Serum
about: What it is:A nourishing overnight serum remastered with Japanese red camellia oil that hydrates hair while you sleep to deliver shiny, soft, and less frizzy hair by morning..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Intensely hydrates, nourishes, and detangles hair overnight.Highlighted Ingredients:- Japanese Red Camellia Oil: One of the most rapidly absorbed oils, rich in antioxidants, essential lipids, and vitamins A, C, and E to nourish, hydrate, and enhance shine..What Else You Need to Know:Wake up to flawless hair with this luxurious overnight hair serum that nourishes, softens, and reduces frizz for gorgeous hair by morning. The lightweight cream formula, infused with precious Japanese red camellia oil, is quickly absorbed, non-greasy, color-safe, and pillow-proof. When applied at nighttime, hair will be smooth, hydrated, and ready for styling by morning with no need to rinse..Fragrance Description:An iconic interpretation of the camellia flower composed of grapefruit and green aqueous top notes, subtle camellia in the heart, and delicate vanilla with musk in the base notes...Clinical Results:In a controlled study using Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Hair Serum, results showed versus non-conditioning shampoo:
ingredients: -Japanese Red Camellia Oil: One of the most rapidly absorbed oils, rich in antioxidants, essential lipids, and vitamins A, C, and E to nourish, hydrate, and enhance shine...Aqua / Water / Eau, Dimethicone, C13-16 Isoalkane, Glycerin, Polyacrylamide, Phenoxyethanol, C13-14 Isoalkane, Laureth-7, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Isoeugenol, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5, Ci 15985 / Yellow 6, Parfum / Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before going to sleep, apply one to two pumps into palms, depending on hair thickness and length..-Distribute throughout mid-lengths and ends of dry or damp hair..-Ideally, use a comb to evenly distribute the product..-Leave in overnight, do not rinse..-In the morning, style hair as usual with no need to rinse..-Complete routine with shu uemurau2019s Essence Absolue Nourishing Protective Hair Oil (sold separately) during the day for maximum hydration benefits...Pro tips:.-After applying one to two pumps to mid-lengths and ends, put hair in a top knot or braid overnight..-In the morning, shake out hair for effortless beach waves with no need to rinse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample & loved it. it is lightweight and feels great on my hair, i had to come back and get the full size! It is expensive though so i would suggest getting a sample to see how you like it first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This overnight serum makes my hair feel soft. It is very lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of very fine hair that is long with dry ends and oily roots. I got a sample of this product (a sizable one) and really liked it. I haven't tried the ultimate reset overnight serum, but in comparison to the Kerastase overnight serum I unfortunately like this one more - I find it more moisturizing while just as lightweight. However, it's more expensive and the while the scent is light and clean, it reminds me of expensive diaper cream.

reviews.review_title: A must after a everything shower
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I hate hair serum that makes your hair feel oily. this one was light and not over baring with smell either. I'm a picky person especially in terms of texture for my hair and skin. Lovely product would recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great addition to my overnight serums
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum leaves my ends looking more hydrated when I wake up in the morning. It smells good and feels light and absorbs quickly. I use it a few times a week and I donu2019t notice a lot of product buildup. Iu2019d keep using this but then I tried their Ultimate Reset overnight serum and I like that one more. Iu2019m happy to have both serums on hand so I can alternate between the two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. This is going to give you bounce and luxurious hair. Love placing it on my split ends before wrapping my hair at night I wake up and my hair is beautiful. I will never stop buying this. A little foes a long way and it's worth the price. A bottle last me about 7 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum over the past 5 months and it works great, this one and the Kerastase serum are my favorites. Smells so luxurious!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: after water first main ingredient causes hair loss. Only looks like itu2019s working bc it builds up a greasy appearance until your hair is brittle and breaks off. Just like oleplex oil. Not to mention the other ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! This overnight serum works miracles.  I wake up in the morning and my hair is bouncy and shiny and ready to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a cream based formula great for overnight hair or to spray on curly hair textures. It strengthens hair strands similar to a leave in conditioner. I really Love the Smell and light weight consistency. Great for All Hair Types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: nice product very light made hair light it did grow hair was not as dry and brittle did improve will be buying again to use regularly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this last month and the result is tremendous!! my split ends seemed to have fixed itself and the ends are super smooth and frizz free now. I definitely recommend trying this product. Well worth the money!!

reviews.review_title: Seems to help with frizz & Smells Good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair used to be crazy thick, curly, long, beautiful and healthy. Over the last few years it's become extremely brittle and breaks easily, falls out by the handfuls so now it's super thin, top half doesn't seem to grow anymore, dry, wavy, just awful and I don't know what to do at this point. I used a box of G hair dye about two years ago and by the time I was done putting it in my hair I started smelling my hair burning so immediately washed it out and contacted the company. Turns out it was expired and they offered nothing, no help whatsoever. My hairs been awful since. This product smells great! Clean and fresh, neither feminine or masculine. You only use 2-3 pumps to put in the mid section and ends and tie your hair up loosely at night. I don't think my hair is fixable at this point so I can't really say I've seen much of a difference except it doesn't seem as frizzy. It doesn't leave your hair greasy or anything and doesn't need washed out which is a huge plus. I'll continue to use what I have and hopefully can see a difference and update my review.

reviews.review_title: Everything that I needed for my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something to help my hair and this serum is everything that I was looking for. My hair looks health and I love the hair texture. I strongly recommend for everyone this amazing serum.

reviews.review_title: The hair serum Iu2019ve been looking for forever!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have long hair that gets really dry and frizzy at the ends, so Iu2019ve tried lots of hair serums to try to fix that problem, and this is the first one that doesnu2019t make the rest of my hair greasy! I can just apply abd go about my day. Frizz is much less of an issue. Smells great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is delicious but other than that, was nothing special.

reviews.review_title: This is a very very good product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it left both me and my sons hair so so shiny I truly recommend & I will use it again

reviews.review_title: Amazing Bedtime Product to eliminate Frizz
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love:  I have fine hair which tends to frizz.  The size of dime did an amazing job of keeping my frizz free.  A Must try product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have blonde hair that very easily gets dry, especially now with the cold weather. I used this overnight serum for a few nights in a row, just working it through my ends before bedtime, on dry hair. I woke up with super soft and well nourished hair every time. I think this product really does what it says, and I fully recommend it, despite the higher price point, itu2019s definitely worth it!

reviews.review_title: Not for me but might be for you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free and I have been using it for 2 weeks. I've tried it on my hair both dry and damp. The first time I used it was on dry hair. It went on easy enough and left my hair feeling soft. I styled my hair as usual and I think the product weighed it down. I had curled my hair and within a few hours they fell. I put it on my hair damp and again my hair was soft in the morning. I normally wash my hair every other day but by the end of the day my hair felt greasy. It took a while but I finally figured out a good amount to use and where exactly to apply it. I probably wouldn't buy it, but I might recommend it to someone who has dry hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t sure what to expect from this product, especially due to the price. However, Iu2019m glad to say that I loved it. I used it after towel drying my hair and was really hoping that it would control my frizz for the following day. I usually wash my hair before bed so I sometimes wake up with messy hair. However, this product really help tame my frizzy hair and left my hair feeling super soft. Iu2019d been using a shampoo that dried my hair out a lot and this definitely helped a lot. The smell is also lovely (floral) but not overpowering. Overall, I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hair Type: Curly  Product Type: Watery Cream Scent: Soft Earthy Scent, Overpowering  Use: Over Night My curls loved it. My hair needs TLC all day everyday the whole 24hrs. Itu2019s nice to sleep with a product in my hair and to wake up with hydrated hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells great! Itu2019s extremely moisturizing and leaves no sticky residue on my hair. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful product! Great for color and heat damage

reviews.review_text: I have used the new Shu Uemura Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Hair Serum daily for the past week now and I am very impressed with how wonderful my hair feels and looks since Iu2019ve began u using  using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells great and is very moisturizing without the residue. The serum is so light, my coils drink it up! Seems to be much needed. Simple instruction of application allowed for soft hydrated coils. I am so in love with thee smell....it's giving; fresh wash from the salon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this hair serum. It smells really nice and for some reason it reminds me of something I have used in the past. It absorbed easily on my dry hair and actually made it look great before bed. It tamed all my frizz and redefined my curls. When I woke up my hair looked more tamed than usual. I just needed to touch it up and bit and I was ready to walk out of the house. I really liked that it didnu2019t add any additional oiliness to my hair. My hair feels nourished but not heavy. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it just like every Shu Uemura hair product! My hair felt soft in the morning and residue free. Smells nice and clean!  Thank you BzzAgent! Opinion is my honest opinion and I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to try Shu uemura nourishing overnight hair serum and I'm highly satisfied with my overall experience. The formula smells amazing and helps keep my hair frizz free and my curls hydrated. My hair feels amazing and super soft. I can feel the difference with my hair overall. The formula is not too thick and heavy which is a bonus. I would definitely purchase again. I was gifted this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum smells amazing ! Leaves hair not greasy so you feel good sleeping over night . Hair feels soft and looking fabulous in the morning.  Got this product for my honest review from bzzagent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous serum! The smell is lovely, my hair feels moisturized and it doesn't weight down my hair at all. I used it overnight and there was a noticeable difference after one use. I received this product as a sample to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING!! smells amazing and left my hair soft and manageable.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for post-wash, on the ends of my thin hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, fine and dry hair, especially at the ends with oily roots. This serum works perfectly on the ends of my hair, after washing to smooth it out, tame frizz without weighing my hair down. Plus it smells fantastic! Wish it weren't so pricey.

reviews.review_title: My new go to hair serum!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! A lot of hair serums just sit on top of the hair and doesn't get absorbed quickly.  This one does!  I apply a little to the tips after I wash my hair, and the next day, my hair is soft and shiny, and considerably less frizzy!  The fragrance is sweet and light, not overly overpowering.  This serum will be added to my new daily routine!

reviews.review_title: Makes your hair smooth and silky.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For some time now, Shu Ueruma has been my go-to hair care brand. Recently, they have another amazing product that has quickly become one of my favorites.   It's usually difficult for me to hydrate my hair in the winter, but this Shu Uemura Essence Absolue Nourishing Taming Overnight Serum hydrate and nourish my hair while I sleep, allowing me to finally wake up with a healthy soft and shiny hair.   The serum penetrates every strand without leaving any greasy stains or spots on any of my linens.   I like to apply two to three pumps just before bed and style it the morning.  Another plus is that it also protects my hair against future dryness with very little effort required on my end .  I adore how little work it takes on my part to prevent my hair from getting dry in the future.  I would 100% recommend getting this serum to anyone who takes a good care of their hair. 10/10  I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy and simple to use. My hair tends to be frizzy and tangled in the morning so using Overnight Serum I did notice that my hair was a lot less frizzy. So much easier to comb. I donu2019t think it would be beneficial to anyone with very fine or thin hair think it would be

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first because I really love the serum I had been using, but this serum is a treat! I kind of has a leave in conditioner consistency so I was worried it would make my hair greasy, but that wasnu2019t the case. My hair absorbed everything thatu2019s in this serum and I woke up with super soft hair day after day. Curly girl recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Compared to others, the first application left my hair frizz free and shiny. You will not regret buying it since you will see changes from the first application. I would buy it without thinking and I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a game changer! My hair is fine, dry, and fizzy, and Iu2019m constantly looking for products to tame it. This overnight serum is light weight and leaves my hair feeling hydrated and less frizzy.

reviews.review_title: Great smell but weighs hair down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting an oil-like feel but itu2019s more like a thick, creamy serum. Itu2019s easy to get it into the hair and it smells amazing. I have fine hair though and feel like it weighed it down too much although it did feel smoother when applied.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite hair care products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to revise this item in a promotion, I was going to even purchase it prior to. Look at the reviews and jngredients they use only the quality. Putting it on after the shower helps to prevent breakage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the smell of the product, it is not sweet it is elegant. The texture of the product is liquid not oil, it is easy to apply to hair. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this product I was expecting an oil serum but I love that it is a creamy serum! I feel like it sinks into my hair instead of sitting on top. I also mix it up and add it to my hair after a shower and let it hair dry and my waves love It.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is wonderful! It has a pleasant fullness and just two pumps is enough to spread through the hair. I recommend this product
This goes on easily and smells amazing. I have fine hair and it moisturizes and gives it shine without weighing my hair down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair was recently damaged from bleaching and after using this I noticed a big change within a week! The smell is great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells amazing!! Omg. I canu2019t quite place the scent but it is light and delicate. It reminds me a bit of honeysuckle. Iu2019m not sure but I find it intoxicating, lol. This oil smells and feels luxurious. I wish it more more affordable but 1 oz will last me a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find that this product is best to use after wash day. After washing and detangling, comb the product in to your hair and put hair into braids. Woke up with a beautiful shine. Also I love the smell of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing extraordinary.  Reduced frizz, but at the expense of weighing my hair down.  By day two (after single use), my hair felt extremely oily.  For the price, just not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gel/cream texture is a little hard to evenly distribute, but the results are just too good for me to care. I put this on at night and the next morning I was unbraiding it and my boyfriend said u201cwow, itu2019s cool that you wake up and your hair is so shiny.u201d Um yeah, Iu2019ll take a life time supply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice. Doesnu2019t leave hair feeling greasy. I would definitely recommend to anyone needing an overnight refresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a free sample of this & was quite impressed. Let us start with it having a fragrance type of smell. I don't know if it will bother those sensitive, but it didn't bother me. It is a super light fragrance that is nice and not overpowering. The oil itself isn't too greasy, not too runny, & applies nicely.  It leaves hair with a healthy sheen & soft to the touch feel. I think this will be good as we enter colder temps to keep hair soft & with a nice sheen. I only got a small sample, and I feel I need to use it longer to see long-term results. That is the only reason I gave it 4 stars & not 5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this serum- itu2019s fairly light both Iu2019m feel and scent, and I like that it doesnu2019t leave my hair greasy or weighed down. The day results lasted until my next wash and seemed to leave my hair nourished. Interested to see if this lasts in further uses.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your hair care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product out for a few weeks, I'm hPpy to report that my hair was very moisturized and back to being shiny.  It doesn't dry out your scalp like traditional serums do.  It did take a couple of applications before you started to see results but the results were worth the wait.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.  I really like this serum, itu2019s super light and doesnu2019t make my hair greasy. It just left it super smooth and nourished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice! My hair felt super smooth the next morning. Iu2019ve used it multiple times. Does not have a distinctive smell which is nice,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine thin hair this hair serum seems to be really working I love the consistency and the feel of it in my hair it is light doesn't weighs down the hair my hair soaked up the product almost instantly and the very next day my hair is smoother and a bit shinier totally a win win  I received a free sample of shu uemura Essence Absolute Nourishing Overnight Hair Serum free from BzzAgent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

It smells nice, and didnu2019t break my face out around my hairline either, which is great. Iu2019d definitely purchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from BzzAgent for my honest review. I have been using this for couple weeks and I donu2019t see any results. This is supposed to work like overnight serum but no effect when I wake up in the next morning. My hair is still dry and not nourished feeling at all. I also dislike its samell very much. Even my husband said there is weird smell from my hair while sleeping next to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the shu uemura Essence Absolute Nourishing Overnight Hair Serum for free through BzzAgent. I have been struggling with dry hair lately and this serum gave my hair a noticeable difference in just one use. I love the smell of the product and the light consistency. I didnu2019t find my hair greasy after use, but soft and silky. I will continue to use this and will buy it again. I highly recommend if your hair is in need of some extra love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the consistency of this product. It absorbs into my curly hair easily and definitely makes it feel more hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a light scent and feels like a lightweight gel serum. It absorbed instantly into my very dry curly hair. It was easy to apply and absorb and felt fine in the hair as an overnight serum. I did not notice any dramatic visible results but my ends do feel a bit more hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent and loved it! When I applied it, I woke up with less frizzy hair and also didnu2019t think the scent was over powering. Would buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying this product smells great! I've been using this for a few weeks and while I think it helps with frizz a bit, I've not noticed as much of a difference in the shine or overall appearance of my hair. This didn't leave my hair greasy or add any extra weight, and may work better on less thick hair, so I'd recommend if you don't have very thick hair.

reviews.review_title: Best overnight hair serum- must have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the free Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Hair Serum by Shu Uemura from  from the BzzAgent in exchange for an honest review. I love this serum! It goes on the hair easy, leaves it very manageable and smooth. It does not leave my hands nor hair greasy and smells amazing. Definitely recommend, specially for colored and treated hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this oil helped my hair stay shiny throughout a whole week and i love the scent it gave my hair even when it got dirty. i would not pay that much for a full price bottle but it is a good product and i love using it for when my curls need a some moisture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would have to try this more in order to give it more stars because I had a sample size . I probably would not pay that much for this product. It did smell nice though.

reviews.review_title: Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Serum: A Nigh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disclosure: I received a free sample in exchange for this review.  The Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Serum is a hair care revelation. Its sleek packaging and delicate fragrance set the stage for a premium experience.  This serum's unique overnight treatment formula is a game-changer. Lightweight and non-greasy, it's easy to apply, and a little goes a long way. After using it for several weeks, my hair felt softer, smoother, and visibly shinier. It tamed frizz and repaired damage, reducing breakage.  Enriched with camellia oil, it's suitable for all hair types. It leaves no residue, ensuring you wake up with refreshed, revitalized hair. If you're after a high-quality, transformative hair treatment, Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Serum is a must-try. I highly recommend it for healthier, shinier, and more manageable locks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so happy I was able to try this! I struggle with dry and frizzy curly hair and Iu2019m always looking for products that will help diffuse that situation. I tried the Shu Uemura hair serum and in a week I noticed my hair was significantly less frizzy and a lot more softer. The smell of the product makes it even nicer to use! I will definitely be buying this in a larger size to keep using.

reviews.review_title: EH! Definitely not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Put on before bed a few days but had to stop because it made my split ends look worse and got my hair looking more dry. When I put on before bed, hair looks nice but come morning time hair looked so dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A lovely fragrance and makes my hair so soft and silky! I have curly hair and usually need to wash it in the morning because with the frizz and everything else it never looks or feels good after sleeping. Dry shampoo never does the job for me. Either my hair ends up looking greasy or static-y. I wasn't sure if I would like this product, but at least loved the smell. My boyfriend and I were pleasantly surprised with my hair the next day! I would purchase this in the future. Great for late nights when I have work the next morning and for lazy days in!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like Shu Uemura Essence Absolue Nourishing Overnight Hair Serum. It leaves my hair silky soft and frizz free. I just use two pumps on each side of my hair and run it through my hair. When I wake up the next day my hair looks great! Itu2019s moisturized and my curls are bouncy. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Left my hair shiny and sleek. Smelled really nice even had bees following my hair. Definitely recommend, my hair was not frizzy or dry.  Loved this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The overnight hair Serum made my hair smell really good. When I woke up my hair was soft and shiny but by the end of the day my hair was a little greasy. I do like it and probably would get this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the results from this serum on my hair it leaves my hair shiny and soft to the touch it helps so much from the dry weather. Shu Uemura sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange of my honest opinion. This hair serum has a light texture and a nice floral scent. I apply it at night, it's not greasy so it does not leave my pillow oily. In the morning I woke up with softer and less frizzy hair. I have long, slightly curly, dyed hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum intensely hydrates, nourishes, and detangles my hair overnight, leaving it soft, smooth, and remarkably shiny by morning. What sets it apart is its quick absorption, non-greasy formula that wonu2019t transfer onto your pillow, making it perfect for nightly use.

reviews.review_title: Light product, not made for my hair type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a tiny sample of this product and used it on my coils hair after washing and before braiding. The product is very light and I donu2019t think it is made for my hair. The sample was unfortunately too small to be able to test it out on my hair. Overall it is not made for my hair and I would not use it of recommend it to anyone with similar hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this makes me hair feel, a big dose of hydration and helps tame frizz so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product both at night alone and tried it in the morning as well to see if it could replace my current hair serum that I get from my stylist. I have chemically treated fine hair (a perm to make it wavy) thatu2019s naturally a bit oily but with the perm my ends need extra help. Unfortunately, it was not enough moisture to replace the serum I already use, so this would have to be more of an add on to my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample sized product for free in exchange for an honest review. I have very thick, wavy/curly, long frizzy hair. It tends to get dry, especially during winter. And in the humidity it gets thicker (expands) and frizzier and gets hard to control. Plus, with this ridiculous summer heat, the last thing I want to do is stand there drying my hair under a hot hot blow dryer. However, blowing it out seems to be the only way to make it silky smooth and not frizzy. But this product seems to do the trick!! Iu2019ve tried it a few times on dry hair before bed. I was worried that I would wake up with really greasy hair, and oil all over my pillowcase, which could also lead to skin breakouts ( this has happened  before with other oily hair serums). This serum is very light and did not leave any oil behind and it did not make my hair greasy at all. In the morning after using this overnight my hair is super soft, smooth, silky and no frizz! I would definitely recommend to give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the overnight serum smells wonderful. The scent is floral and yet sweet. I love the scent. I also thought that it did seem to make my hair less frizzy when I wake up in the morning. I did find that because my hair is so long, I did use 4 pumps instead of the recommended 2 pumps. I thought that 4 pumps was just the perfect amount to fully spread it in my hair. Overall, I would recommend this overnight serum to my friends and family.

reviews.review_title: Could be great on the right hair type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product wasn't good for my kinky hair. It soften my hair but that was about all it did. I actually ended up applying it to my wig as a detangling product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for writing a honest review. I have straight hair with some curly baby hairs here and there. My hair is very thin but I have a lot of it, it is long and natural. Where I live I deal with humidity and high temperatures that make my hair frizzy and hard to control. I received this product about a week and a half or two ago and Iu2019ve used it 6 times so far. I used it after washing my hair before bed. I also tried the wavy hair tricks it recommends. My hair is a bit long (almost waist length) so I used between 2-3 pumps. This serum is very light and has a delightful aroma. I let it sit overnight and in the morning my hair is soft and shiny. Iu2019ve had multiple people compliment my hair since I started using this product. I will definitely be purchasing this product again and make a mandatory step of my hair care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've Used This Shu Uemura (Overnight Hair Serum) For Over Two Weeks, & I'm Already Impressed With The Results! I've Been Battling Dry, Damaged Hair For 3 Years, But t This serum Is Really Making A Difference In Terms Of Replenishing My Hair's Moisture Content. My Curls Are Incredibly More Moisturized & Touchably Soft. I'll Keep Using This Serum, & I Definitely Plan To Buy The full-Size Bottle As Soon As Possible!

reviews.review_title: Softer and More defined curls in the morning
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have damaged bleached hair, it is wavy and after taking a shower I applied it and went to bed. The next day I woke up to a more defined curly hair, I didnu2019t brush it as I know it would go all over the place. Definitely give it a go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, thick, wavy hair that is prone to a lot of frizz.  This product has done more to calm the flyaways in my hair than any other I have tried.  It is lightweight, smells amazing, and it leaves my hair soft and manageable when I wake up.  I was worried that it might leave my hair greasy, but that hasn't been the case.  I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It's made my hair feel so smooth and shiny and not at all oily. I've only been using it for a few days now and I can't believe that I can already see such great results. I'm definitely going to need to replenish my stock soon ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pro: Smells really good, not overpowering.   Cons: The product didnu2019t do anything for my textured hair. It can be somewhat beneficial if applied after a wash & go or blow drying. In sum, I wouldnu2019t include in my hair routine.   I received free product in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not for my hair type. My hair just sucks this product up. But I do like the consistency and the scent.
